scripts.pub-get-all: cd libs/utils && pub get && cd ../typescript_reporter && cd ../../core && pub get && cd ../libs/typescript_generator && pub get && cd ../io_utils && pub get && cd ../../ai_server && pub get && cd ../editor_client && pub get && cd ../editor_server && pub get && cd ../game_client && pub get && cd ../game_server && pub get && cd ../hero_server && pub get && cd ../user_server && pub get && cd ../logger_server && pub get
scripts.pub-upgrade-all: cd libs/utils && pub upgrade && cd ../typescript_reporter && cd ../../core && pub upgrade && cd ../libs/typescript_generator && pub upgrade && cd ../io_utils && pub upgrade && cd ../../ai_server && pub upgrade && cd ../editor_client && pub upgrade && cd ../editor_server && pub upgrade && cd ../game_client && pub upgrade && cd ../game_server && pub upgrade && cd ../hero_server && pub upgrade && cd ../user_server && pub upgrade && cd ../logger_server && pub upgrade
scripts.generate-core: cd core && pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs && prettier --write "**/*.ts"
scripts.start-proxy: cd proxy_server && nodemon --watch proxy_server --exec ts-node index.ts
scripts.build-snapshots: dart --snapshot=libs/snapshots/ai.dart.snapshot ai_server/bin/ai_server_start.dart && dart --snapshot=libs/snapshots/editor.dart.snapshot editor_server/bin/editor_server_start.dart && dart --snapshot=libs/snapshots/game.dart.snapshot game_server/bin/game_server_start.dart && dart --snapshot=libs/snapshots/hero.dart.snapshot hero_server/bin/hero_server_start.dart && dart --snapshot=libs/snapshots/user.dart.snapshot user_server/bin/main.dart && dart --snapshot=libs/snapshots/runner.dart.snapshot libs/io_utils/bin/run_production.dart
